Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: instance type (number) does not match any allowed primitive type (allowed: ["integer"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":"/properties/wind/properties/speed"} instance: {"pointer":"/wind/speed"} domain: "validation" keyword: "type" found: "number" expected: ["integer"]
